creator: Jean-Francois.Lamy@teximus.com
text:
The sample code to invoke a SVG to JPEG transformation correctly creates a JPEG 
file, but just hangs forever.  Apparently some AWT threads are still lying 
around.

To reproduce, compile the sample from the rasterizer documentation page...

Java programs that does graphics start automatically a AWT thread.
That's not a Batik issue - it's a jdk issue.
creator: tkormann@apache.org
